headline: Show HN: Web3 AWS Lambda
description:
Ever since I've been building in web3, one problem I've always faced was listening to and responding to on-chain events with some processing on my end. I've traditionally maintained my own server to make this happen - especially for any data sync, notifications, etc

When I discovered the ThirdLambda team and what they were doing, I found it super useful - they let you run serverless cloud functions responding to on-chain events.

They're currently onboarding users off a priority list, so check it out and let me know what you think!
description_zh-Hans: 自从我在web3中进行构建以来，我一直面临的一个问题是在我的终端上通过一些处理来监听和响应链上事件。当我发现ThirdLambda团队和他们正在做的事情时，我发现它非常有用--他们让你运行无服务器的云功能来响应链上事件。
description_zh-Hant: 自從我在web3中進行構建以來，我一直面臨的一個問題是在我的終端上通過一些處理來監聽和響應鏈上事件。當我發現ThirdLambda團隊和他們正在做的事情時，我發現它非常有用--他們讓你運行無服務器的雲功能來響應鏈上事件。
